ranked_signals.title: Trump EPA rescinds 2009 endangerment finding, dismantling legal basis for federal climate regulation
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Removes legal foundation for decades of US climate regulation. Unprecedented rollback affecting global climate governance framework. Cascading effects on state-level policies and international negotiations.

ranked_signals.title: New START nuclear treaty set to expire February 2026, no replacement in sight
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Expiry of last remaining nuclear arms control framework between US and Russia. Removes final constraint on nuclear arsenal expansion. Existential-level strategic stability risk.

ranked_signals.title: Global solar + wind capacity to reach 4,000 GW in 2026, overtaking coal and gas for first time
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Historic inflection point in global energy system. First time renewable capacity exceeds fossil fuel capacity. Signals irreversible energy transition trajectory.

ranked_signals.title: Global growth slows to 2.7% in 2026; US recession probability at 35% says JP Morgan
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Below pre-pandemic growth with elevated recession risk. Tariff barriers disrupting global supply chains. Divergent performance between developed and emerging markets.

ranked_signals.title: Deepfake-as-a-Service surge: AI identity fraud involved in 30% of corporate impersonation attacks
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Industrialization of AI fraud capabilities. Triple-digit growth in financial losses. Fundamental threat to identity verification systems and trust infrastructure.

ranked_signals.title: India AI Impact Summit: Adani pledges $100B for renewable AI data centers by 2035
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Massive infrastructure investment reshaping global AI compute landscape. India positioning as major AI hub. Convergence of AI infrastructure and renewable energy investment.

ranked_signals.title: US-China summit series: four meetings planned for 2026 as de-risking framework takes shape
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Shift from zero-sum confrontation to managed competition. New bipolar framework emerging. Global industrial strategy playbook being exported.

ranked_signals.title: High Seas Treaty enters into force January 2026, covering two-thirds of world's ocean
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Historic governance milestone for 90% of Earth's habitat by volume. Tension with Japan's deep-sea rare earth extraction. Establishes framework for ocean biodiversity protection.

ranked_signals.title: US GENIUS Act: comprehensive stablecoin regulation rules due by July 2026
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: First comprehensive digital asset regulatory framework in major economy. Stablecoin regulation moving from theory to practice. Reshapes global fintech and crypto landscape.

ranked_signals.title: One-third of teens prefer AI chatbots over humans for emotional support; toddler AI buddies emerge
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Fundamental shift in human social-emotional development patterns. AI companionship for children without guardrails. Association with teen mental health crisis.

ranked_signals.title: Tesla plans 50,000 Optimus humanoid robots at $20-30K; commercial availability begins
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Commercial humanoid robotics entering market at consumer-accessible price. Labor market disruption potential. AI agent frameworks maturing from experimental to strategic.

ranked_signals.title: MIT Technology Review 2026 Breakthroughs: sodium-ion batteries top the list
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Sodium-ion as cheaper safer alternative to lithium disrupts battery supply chains. Base-edited babies mark precision medicine milestone. Multiple breakthrough technologies converging.

ranked_signals.title: IPBES: all business sectors must respond to biodiversity loss; global soil moisture declining
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Biodiversity loss becomes universal business risk per IPBES. Soil moisture decline threatens food security. Ocean darkening signals fundamental marine ecosystem change.

ranked_signals.title: Hydrogen economy at make-or-break point: 2 Mtpa poised for FID in 2026
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Critical year for hydrogen investment decisions. Nuclear-hydrogen integration strategy emerging. Sixfold production growth projected to 2030.

ranked_signals.title: Middle East instability intensifies: possible Lebanon civil war, Yemen escalation in 2026
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Multiple conflict scenarios converging. Europe's internal divisions deepening. Defense spending fatigue creating political strain.

ranked_signals.title: EU bans destruction of unsold clothes; Amsterdam and Florence ban fossil fuel advertising
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: EU circular economy regulation advancing. City-level climate action outpacing national policy. Climate litigation trend spreading to new jurisdictions.

ranked_signals.title: SpaceX to compete in Pentagon autonomous drone program, expanding defense footprint
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Blurring of commercial space and defense sectors. AI-enabled autonomous military systems proliferating. Multi-robot coordination advancing toward deployment.

ranked_signals.title: Mechanistic interpretability: mapping AI model inner workings becomes 2026 breakthrough
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Progress toward AI transparency and safety. Moving beyond black-box treatment of neural networks. Foundation for AI governance and regulation.

ranked_signals.title: UNCTAD: 10 trends shaping global trade; tariffs rise sharply led by US industrial objectives
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Trade fragmentation accelerating. US tariffs disrupting supply chains. Uneven impact across sectors and trading partners.

ranked_signals.title: Executive Order 14386: Strengthening US defense with coal power generation fleet
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Policy tension: coal support alongside global renewable transition. Defense infrastructure tied to fossil fuels. Counter-signal to climate action momentum.

ranked_signals.title: WHO 2026 appeal: $1 billion for 36 emergencies as humanitarian financing contracts
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Growing gap between humanitarian need and available funding. 14 Grade 3 emergencies. Climate-health nexus intensifying.

ranked_signals.title: EU nuclear revival: 81.2 GW capacity target by 2040 as SMR projects advance toward construction
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Major European policy reversal on nuclear energy. SMR pipeline advancing. Energy security concerns overriding previous phase-out commitments.

ranked_signals.title: WHO Pandemic Agreement 5th IGWG meeting: pathogen access and benefit-sharing negotiations continue
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Pandemic preparedness framework progressing. WHO governance reform underway. Financial sustainability of global health institutions at stake.

ranked_signals.title: Refinity validates breakthrough plastic waste conversion technology with DuoZone reactor
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Addresses difficult-to-recycle plastics. Patent-protected innovation. Moving toward commercial demonstration scale.

ranked_signals.title: Apple teases globally synchronized March 4 launch across New York, London, Shanghai
ranked_signals.impact_rationale: Reflects global product launch strategy evolution. Lower structural impact but high market attention.
